channel.title: Players going over max then crashing?
channel.description:
Sometimes when someone pks someone else I get this error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 24 //24 players? the max is 20... at client.PKz(client.java:21206) //and the error is returned from the players[killerID] array element at client.ApplyDead(client.java:21328) // vv everything below is clean, just activates pkz() at client.ApplyDead(client.java:21318) at client.process(client.java:15343) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:56)[/code]
Now it looks like more than the maximum players are getting on my server, but the only thing that returns an outofboundsexception is this. A lot of other player processing junk that must be outofbounds also is not giving me any errors. I'm comepletely stumped. Any ideas?
P.S. My server base is Ultimate PK, which is buggy and gave me errors from the start, but I fixed them all except this one.
Edit: And oh, it crashes server also. My autorebooter-crash-detector picks it up, but it still increases downtime.

item.title: Players going over max then crashing?
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

Sometimes when someone pks someone else I get this error:

Now it looks like more than the maximum players are getting on my server, but the only thing that returns an outofboundsexception is this. A lot of other player processing junk that must be outofbounds also is not giving me any errors. Iâ€™m comepletely stumped. Any ideas?

Edit: And oh, it crashes server also. My autorebooter-crash-detector picks it up, but it still increases downtime.
